utils Package¶

sockette Module¶

class marilla.utils.sockette.SendCommand(ip='127.0.0.1', port=None, command='')¶

Send command to a server

Parameters:
  • ip (string) – ip of the local server
  • port (int) – port number
  • command (string) – command to execute by server
close()¶

Close the protocol

send()¶

send the command to server

marilla.utils.sockette.get_open_port()¶

generate an empty port number and return it

Returns:port number
marilla.utils.sockette.read_tmp_port()¶

read port from tmp port file
